In the movie 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3' (2023), what is the relationship between Adam Warlock and the Sovereign?
Options:
A. Adam Warlock is a member of the Sovereign.
B. Adam Warlock was created by the Sovereign and is considered a newborn.

D. Adam Warlock seeks revenge against the Sovereign.
Correct Answer: Adam Warlock was created by the Sovereign and is considered a newborn.
